title: And on the Third Day - Be yom hashlishi [2010 - Israel] drama

1 Award Win & 7 Award Nominations

Set in a futuristic Israel, diseased with rampant violence and political anarchy, the movie portrays a society in crisis, ruled by institutional corruption and infused with sexual perversion. Amidst the chaos of this degenerate urban setting, several different characters attempt to piece their broken lives back together, battling violence and injustice and longing to find intimacy, if only for a fleeting moment in time.
